Data: But enough about us. Word from the middle is that Australia have won the toss and they will be batting, rather unsurprisingly, given the hard, flat nature of his MCG surface. They've made two changes, with Brad Haddin and Stuart Clark in for James Hopes and Brad Hogg.
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, 1 wide and runs first up, as Sreesanth charges in and pitches down leg side, thats a wide to get Australia on the board
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run better stuff, back of a length on off stump and Gilchrist defends to point
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run tight stuff, good length on off stump and he pushes to cover this time

Sreesanth to Gilchrist, OUT oh thats unlucky! Sreesanth pitches much fuller and gets it to swing in, Gilchrist is stuck to his crease as he drives and gets the thickest of inside-edges back onto his pads but umpire Koertzen doesn't pick it, instead slowly raising his finger to upho
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run back of a length and lifting outside off, Ponting gets in and leaves
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run good length, bringing Ponting forward on the defensive to cover
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run beaten! This one moves away off a length and Ponting pushes down the wrong line ... good ball to end the over
Sharma to Hayden, (no ball) and he fires one very wide of the stumps, and he's overstepped
Sharma to Hayden, no run this one angles across him, fairly wide, and Hayden cannot get there
Sharma to Hayden, no run this one as well, angled very wide across Hayden's stumps and he leaves

Sharma to Hayden, FOUR runs edged and dropped! Hayden pushes at one angling away this time and the ball flies off the outside edge but Uthappa at third slip cannot hold on after getting fingertips to it
Sharma to Hayden, 1 wide this one too is very wide of the stumps and Hayden can't get there
Sharma to Hayden, no run width again but no timing from Hayden, who plays it back to Ishant
Sharma to Hayden, no run tight delivery, hitting an off-stump length and coming back in this time, Hayden getting in line and playing it back to Ishant
Sharma to Hayden, no run back to the wider length, angling across, and Hayden leaves it be
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run back of a length delivery outside off, good carry too as Ponting leaves
Sreesanth to Ponting, 2 runs a firm push to a fuller one outside off stump, though not perfectly timed, gets Ponting off the mark, just squirting the gap at cover
Sreesanth to Ponting, 1 run he drives off the front foot again, this time uppishly and streakily through the gap at backward point, to a slightly wider one
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run good length just outside off stump, he drives it to extra cover
Sreesanth to Hayden, FOUR runs top shot, a typical Hayden shot to a gift-wrapped half-volley, driven firmly on the up through a diving extra cover
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run same stuff, driven harder this time and thats why he couldn't beat mid-off
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run full on off stump, bit of swing, Ponting shuffles across and drives, mistiming the shot to midwicket but calling for the one immediately
Sharma to Hayden, FOUR runs wow, thats a shot, just a full face of the bat to another overpitched delivery and the ball races away back past the stumps and mid-off
Sharma to Hayden, 2 runs back of a length, comes back in, pushes into the cover and sets off, and he comes back for the second after an overthrow from Sehwag at mid-off
Sharma to Hayden, no run back of a length, moving away, good carry, Hayden shoulders arms
Sharma to Hayden, (no ball) FOUR runs edged for four, as Hayden drives hard at a no-ball and gets another thick outside edge well over a leaping second slip ... Ishant's over-stepping woes continue
Sharma to Hayden, (no ball) another no-ball! Ishant bowls a decent delivery, slower and full on the stumps and Hayden can only drive it back to him ... but this is ridiculous
Sharma to Hayden, FOUR runs and he connects, swinging one across from off stump and beating mid-on
Sharma to Hayden, 1 run overpitched outside off stump, he drives to extra cover for one
Sreesanth to Hayden, 1 run full on off stump, drives it back between Sreesanth's legs for a single
Sreesanth to Ponting, 1 run short of a length but too straight and he tucks it around the corner for one
Sreesanth to Hayden, 1 run good length outside off and he pushes to extra cover, Gambhir collects and has a throw but misses and Harbhajan fumbles at midwicket
Sreesanth to Ponting, 2 leg byes full on the pads and he flicks that out to deep backward square
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run good length on off stump, Ponting gets in line and plays it back
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run short one down the stumps, Ponting ducks and wide is not called
Sharma to Hayden, no run tries to flick, gets rapped on the pads, outside the line
Sharma to Hayden, OUT and he gets his man, pitching on a good length and just wide of off stump, Hayden goes for a big drive and gets a thin edge to Dhoni
Sharma to Clarke, 1 wide thats full and wide down the pads and Clarke can't get bat on it
Sharma to Clarke, no run gets forward and drives a good length ball to Gambhir at cover
Sharma to Clarke, 3 runs fractionally overpitched on the stumps and Clarke taps it back down the pitch, awkward bounce beats Ishant and Sehwag dives to haul it back in on the ropes
Sharma to Ponting, 3 runs gets forward to a good length one and pushes into the gap at cover-point, really leaning into that one and then running hard for three
Sharma to Clarke, no run thats a better length, getting Clarke to defend off the front foot
Sreesanth to Ponting, 1 run full on the pads and he turns it to square leg for one
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run good length on off stump, Clarke gets forward and defends to cover
Sreesanth to Clarke, 2 runs too straight and he gets back to turn it to midwicket for a brace
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run tad slower, he drives hard and mistimes it to mid-off, who dives to stop
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run straight again, he gets back and works it to Rohit at square leg
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run back of a length on off stump, Clarke gets in line and defends
Sharma to Ponting, no run back of a length on off stump, good lift, he gets back and defends

Sharma to Ponting, OUT edged and gone! Ishant wins the battle again! Its that same, nagging, back of a length delivery outside off stump that gets Ponting up and pushing at it, undone by the extra bounce, and presenting an easy catch into slip's lap
Sharma to Symonds, no run back of a length outside off stump, Symonds shoulders arms
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run back of a length again, seaming back in, Symonds gets back and uses the soft hands to pick up a sharp single in front of point
Sharma to Clarke, no run much fuller and he gets to the pitch, driving into the covers
Sharma to Clarke, 1 run short and a tad too wide, Clarke gets over it and cuts to backward point
Sreesanth to Clarke, 1 run straight on the stumps and he shuffles across, working one to midwicket
Sreesanth to Symonds, no run good bounce, fairly nipping up off a length and getting Symonds airborne, doing well to keep the bat down
Sreesanth to Symonds, 1 wide shorter one, over Symonds' left shoulder, and Koertzen calls it wide
Sreesanth to Symonds, no run short of a length on the stumps, he gets up and keeps it down to square leg
Sreesanth to Symonds, 1 bye slower ball, back of a length and wide enough for him to leave, a fumble allows one
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run back of a length outside off stump, he gets back and defends
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run back of a length, coming in, Clarke watchfully defends to cover
Sharma to Symonds, no run back of a length outside off stump, he opts to leave it be
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run fuller one on the stumps, he shuffles and nudges a quick run to midwicket
Sharma to Clarke, no run back of a length again, getting Clarke shouldering arms this time
Sharma to Clarke, no run touch wider but still on that same channel and Clarke leaves again
Sharma to Clarke, no run good follow-up ball, attempted yorker and Clarke squeezes it to point
Sharma to Clarke, no run good-length ball and Clarke gets right over it, bat and pad married, to defend
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run fraction short and Symonds brings the bat down hard over it, very close to the body but he does well to chop it through gully for one to third man
Pathan to Clarke, FOUR runs thats rubbish, drifting onto the pads and Clarke helps it to fine leg
Pathan to Clarke, no run full on the pads, flicked to Rohit at short midwicket, Symonds is out of his crease and the fielder has a direct hit but bat is just grounded, good effort
Pathan to Clarke, no run again on leg stump, Clarke mistimes his shot back to Pathan
Pathan to Clarke, no run thats the area, hitting a length and angling it away from Clarke, who flirts from the crease and misses
Pathan to Clarke, no run back to a full length, Clarke drives well but straight to Harbhajan at cover
Sreesanth to Symonds, FOUR runs fractionally overpitched and Symonds picks his gap superbly, driving from the crease and piercing extra cover
Sreesanth to Symonds, 1 run shorter one, he gets up and over it, dabbing through gully for one
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run good length but too straight, Clarke shuffles and works it to midwicket
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run good shot, a firm straight drive that hits the stumps at the other end
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run good length and wide, bit of movement away, Clarke sizes it up and leaves be
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run drives a good-length ball hard but cannot beat the man at cover
Pathan to Symonds, no run good length outside off, he initially thinks about playing and then pulls back but the ball kisses his twirling bat and bounces to slip
Pathan to Symonds, no run back of a length on off stump, no width, he gets back and defends
Pathan to Symonds, no run good length on off stump, he inches forward and then defends to point
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run thats a touch shot, Symonds pushing a length ball at mid-off and running
Pathan to Clarke, OUT sharp catch! Clarke throws it away, coming down and clipping the ball to midwicket, where Rohit holds it very well and Australia are four down
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run off the mark immediately, driving a fullish delivery through gully for one
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run short of a length outside off, good carry, Hussey shoulders arms
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run back of a length on the stumps, defended to the fielder in the ring, 'NO!' is the call
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run pitches outside leg, Hussey gets up and defends, again saying no to Symonds
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run but this time he wants one, turning the ball wide of Rohit at square leg
Sreesanth to Symonds, 1 run sits up nicely, getting Symonds up on his toes, he keeps it down to gully
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run good ball, fuller and moving away from an uncertain Hussey, who doesn't completely cover his off stump as he shoulders arms
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run pitches outside leg on a length, Symonds turns it out to deep backward
Pathan to Hussey, no run back of a length and inviting the drive, but Hussey refrains
Pathan to Hussey, no run this one's closer to the stumps and coming in, again its left alone
Pathan to Hussey, 1 wide wrong line, sliding down leg stump and called wide
Pathan to Hussey, no run back of a length again, he gets up and leaves it be once more
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run gets some width and cuts this late, through backward point, for one
Pathan to Symonds, no run pitches on leg stump, he gets up and works it to midwicket
Sharma to Hussey, no run short of a length outside leg, goes away and Hussey hops to defend
Sharma to Hussey, no run sharp carry there, as Hussey leaves one angled across him off a length
Sharma to Hussey, no run slower one, on a good length, gets Hussey coming forward to defend
Sharma to Hussey, no run good length, pitches on leg and moves across, Hussey defends it back
Sharma to Hussey, no run good length, just outside off stump, he gets across and leaves
Sharma to Hussey, no run back of a length on off stump, he hurriedly defends it to Ishant
Pathan to Symonds, no run good length outside off, Symonds comes forward and pushes to cover
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run gets some width and drives hard, a bump ball to a diving cover fielder
Pathan to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off, he opens the face and runs it to gully
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run hits a length and comes in, he gets across and turns it to leg
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run shorter one outside leg, turned off the hips to short fine leg for one
Pathan to Hussey, no run pitches outside off and comes in sharply as Hussey leaves it be
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run good length outside off stump, he leans into a drive towards cover
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run back of a length, extra zip, Hussey gets up and keeps it down to point, then runs hard
Sharma to Symonds, no run sits up again, but Symonds gets over it and late-cuts to gully
Sharma to Symonds, no run short of a length, good lift from Ishant, Symonds gets up and defends

Sharma to Symonds, OUT gone! Ishant again works that outside-the-off-stump line, getting it to lift sharply again and hold its line and straighten, for Symonds to nibble an edge that Dhoni takes, initially moving away but then diving to his right
Sharma to Haddin, no run short of a length and lifting further, Haddin gets across and shoulders arms
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run short of a length on middle and leg, he gets up and tucks it to midwicket
Pathan to Haddin, no run back of a length, angled across, Haddin gets across and defends
Pathan to Haddin, no run bit shorter this time but with no room to work with, Haddin defends off the back foot, making sure to get right in line with the ball
Pathan to Haddin, no run and again, back of a length and Haddin defends off the back foot
Pathan to Haddin, 1 run fuller one now, swinging back in from off stump, driven over Pathan for one
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run strays down the leg stumps and Hussey tucks it to backward square leg
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run short of a length outside leg, Hussey gloves it away off the ribs for one
Sharma to Haddin, no run back of a length outside off and Haddin gets over it well, defending to point
Sharma to Haddin, no run good length outside off, Haddin drives to extra cover this time
Sharma to Haddin, no run back of a length, tidy line once again, and he defends it to point
Sharma to Haddin, no run gets back and tucks this one to square leg, just not wide of the fielder
Sharma to Haddin, no run hits that excellent length again and pushes him back, defending
Pathan to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off stump, Hussey leaves it be
Pathan to Hussey, no run 128ks, again that similar line and length and he leaves be
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run 132.5ks, slides down the pads and he helps it down to fine leg
Pathan to Haddin, no run fuller one, drawing a thick inside-edge as Haddin drives from the crease
Pathan to Haddin, 2 runs thats outside leg stump and turned through square leg for a well-run couple, as the fielder was pretty much right back on the boundary
Pathan to Haddin, no run back of a length this time, and Haddin watchfully defends to point
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, he gets across and nudges one to midwicket

Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up on leg stump, played off the pads, the ball balloons up in the air, there's calls of catch it, catch it and short leg does, but umpire Taufel gets the call right, there was absolutely no bat involved
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up on middle and off, he presses forward and defends
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up again, getting Haddin to come forward and defend
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run drifts onto middle and leg and its defensively turned to midwicket
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run slightly flatter delivery outside off, Haddin gets over it and defends
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run tossed up a fraction short, he gets back and punches into the covers
Sehwag to Haddin, no run well flighted, good rotation on that one, Haddin defends it back
Sehwag to Haddin, no run flatter one, pushing Haddin back, driving to a sharp Rohit at mid-on
Sehwag to Haddin, no run quick and flat again, Haddin gets back and drives to Rohit again
Sehwag to Haddin, 1 run there's some width and Haddin dabs it towards gully for a quick single
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run keeps it quick and flat on off stump and Hussey drives to extra cover
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run that not really short but Hussey pulls from outside off to deep midwicket
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run flat down leg stump, he gets back and flicks to the fielder under the helmet
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up on middle and leg, very flat, and its pushed back down the track
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run flatter still, Haddin gets forward and defends
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run now there's some flight, as he tosses it up on a length, it spins on and beats the bat, Dhoni whips off the bails but the umpire is not interested
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run back to quick and flat, getting Haddin onto the front foot, driving to point
Sehwag to Hussey, no run tossed up on off stump, hint of turn, Hussey gets in line and drives to cover
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run marginally short in length, and he gets back to drive out to deep cover
Sehwag to Haddin, no run gives it some air, Haddin uses his feet and drives back to Sehwag
Sehwag to Haddin, 1 run uses his feet again, to a flighted delivery, and clips wide of mid-on
Sehwag to Hussey, 2 runs drifts onto leg stump, well turned into the gap at backward square leg and Hussey initiated the second with some excellent running
Sehwag to Hussey, no run flatter delivery, middle and leg, defended to the man at midwicket
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up on a length, 80ks, he gets forward and pats it back
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up on middle and leg, defended to short leg

Harbhajan to Haddin, 1 wide, OUT now thats some good glovework! Haddin falls over as he attempts to slog-sweep one drifting down leg stump, but he misses and in a flash Dhoni whips off the bails, effecting a very good leg-side stumping ... Haddin doesn't wait for the referral
Harbhajan to Lee, no run full and flat, getting Lee to come forward and defend it back
Harbhajan to Lee, no run flighted this time, middle and leg, defended to short leg
Harbhajan to Lee, no run quicker one, off a length, gets Lee back in the crease, defending
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tosses it up again, this time Lee smothers the spin completely
Sehwag to Hussey, 2 runs tossed up a bit wide, cut through where slips would've been, for a single
Sehwag to Hussey, no run bit flat and short, Hussey gets back and punches into the covers
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on off stump, bit of turn, but Lee plays it back to Sehwag
Sehwag to Lee, no run quick and flat, he gets over it and defends watchfully
Sehwag to Lee, 2 runs spins down leg stump and Lee plays a neat paddle sweep into the yawning gap behind square, runs hard, and gets two
Sehwag to Lee, 1 run spins down again, leg stump, he sweeps again for a quick single
Harbhajan to Lee, no run quicker one as he sees him coming, Lee adjusts and defends to point

Harbhajan to Lee, no run thats a good shout, as its fired in flat and catches Lee low on the front leg in front of the stumps, they all go up in appeal but Taufel is unmoved ... perhaps a bit of inside-edge there
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tossed up on the stumps, he gets forward and drives to cover
Harbhajan to Lee, no run flat again, middle and off, he gets in line and defends
Harbhajan to Lee, no run this one's got some air on it, Lee gets forward and plays it away
Harbhajan to Lee, no run slides down leg stump, Lee misses the sweep, they all appeal but that pitched outside the line and was carrying down further
Sehwag to Hussey, no run tossed up on off stump, watchfully defended by Hussey
Sehwag to Hussey, no run flatter one on leg stump, worked across towards midwicket, but not past him
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run this time he uses his feet and drives to extra cover for a quick single
Sehwag to Lee, no run spins down leg stump, no bat on that one, Sehwag appeals in vain
Sehwag to Lee, 1 run gets down and paddles one fine, raising Australia's 100 in the 29th over
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run ends the over with a single, dabbing a quick and flat one to point
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run tossed up on off stump, he gets half-forward and defends to point
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run tossed up, comes on with the angle, defended watchfully again
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run slower, flatter one down leg stump, worked to midwicket
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run thats the faster one, 96ks, pushing him back in the crease
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off, getting Hussey over it in defence
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run quick again, and flatter, so Hussey plays it watchfully to point
Sehwag to Lee, no run comes down the track, Sehwag bowls it flat, Lee drives hard to cover
Sehwag to Lee, 1 run again, uses his feet and goes straighter this time, picking up one to long-off
Sehwag to Hussey, FOUR runs finally Hussey gets a boundary, rocking back and pulling a short one over midwicket, one, two, three bounces and over the ropes
Sehwag to Hussey, no run quicker, flatter one outside off stump, Hussey pushes to point
Sehwag to Hussey, 2 runs bit of width outside off and he cracks it past point for a couple
Sehwag to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Hussey picks the length and gets back, driving into the covers to keep hold of the strike
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run sees the width and frees the arms, cutting past backward point
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tossed up on leg stump, played off the pads to forward short leg
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tossed up on off stump, Lee stretches forward and defends
Harbhajan to Lee, 1 run slides down leg stump and he paddles it out to Pathan at fine leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on a length, 82ks, he gets across and works it to midwicket
Harbhajan to Lee, no run much quicker and flatter down leg stump, speared in and catches Lee on the boot but Taufel turns down a half-hearted appeal
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
Yuvraj to Lee, no run tossed up on a length, he waits for the turn and plays it to point
Yuvraj to Lee, 1 leg bye very quick and flat outside leg stump, takes the boot and he scampers a run
Yuvraj to Hussey, FOUR runs bang, thats four, as Hussey slaps a short ball hard over midwicket, one bounce just inside the ropes, well struck
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run slower one, kept full on the stumps and he clips it to midwicket
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run still a bit too short, Hussey works it into the gap at square leg to keep strike
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run tossed up wide of off stump, he has a look-see and leaves it alone
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run too short and wide and its duly cut out to deep point for a single
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tossed up on off stump, spins away, Lee pokes to point but cant beat hin
Harbhajan to Lee, 2 wide slips down leg stump, Lee does a complete 360 in an attempt to paddle it, no contact but its called wide and Dhoni cannot take it cleanly
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on a length, Hussey patiently nudges into the offside for one
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tossed up, Lee gets back and defends it to cover
Harbhajan to Lee, no run gets a short one but cannot cut it away, instead playing it to gully but Hussey won't mind, as he will regain strike
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run spins down leg stump, nudged into the gap for a single
Yuvraj to Lee, 1 run tossed up on leg stump, Lee advances and drives to midwicket
Yuvraj to Hussey, 2 runs spins on from middle and off, Hussey heaves it down to deep square leg
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, he gets over it and gently eases into the gap
Yuvraj to Lee, no run flatter one on off stump, bringing Lee forward to smother the spin
Yuvraj to Lee, no run misses his paddle to one down leg, bowler and 'keeper appeal, umpire unmoved
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run tossed up gently outside off stump, Hussey judges it and prefers to leave
Harbhajan to Hussey, FOUR runs deft touch, Hussey reaching across and paddling one from out in front of his front pad, picking the vacancy at short fine leg and the ball runs away
Harbhajan to Hussey, 2 runs pitches wide and he gets back, cutting through backward point for two
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run tosses it up, 81.5ks, he waits for the spin and runs it fine for one
Harbhajan to Lee, 1 run spins away, off a length, Lee gets across and pushes to point for one
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run gets across and dabs a good-length ball wide of gully for a single that raises a very good fifty
Pathan to Hussey, 1 wide poor ball first up, wide of the stumps and duly called so
Pathan to Hussey, no run good length ball on middle and off, Hussey gets back and defends to Pathan
Pathan to Hussey, no run slides down leg stump, he tries to nudge it but the ball runs off his pads and Pathan runs in and fields
Pathan to Hussey, no run cuts a short one into the covers but cannot beat Raina, the substitute
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run fuller ball, bit of movement through the air, pushed into the covers for one
Pathan to Lee, no run short ball over off stump, Lee takes his eyes off the ball but does move the head out of harm's way as the ball flies past him
Pathan to Lee, no run fuller ball, Lee uses his feet and drives that to extra cover
Tendulkar to Hussey, 1 run slides down leg stump and Hussey sweeps it fine for a single
Tendulkar to Lee, 1 run looped up on leg stump, spins away and Lee nudges to midwicket
Tendulkar to Hussey, no run quicker, flatter, fuller and Hussey inside-edges back onto his feet
Tendulkar to Hussey, 1 run spins down leg stump and Hussey kneels down, sweeping into the gap and that single brings up the 50-run partnership, a top-class effort
Tendulkar to Lee, 1 run now he too paddles one from middle and leg into the gap
Tendulkar to Hussey, 1 run slips down the pads and its run into the gap to get Hussey back on strike
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run flicks a reverse-swinging delivery from middle stump to mid-on, runs hard
Pathan to Lee, OUT and he snaps a threatening partnership, changing his length and pace to get Lee feathering a catch into Dhoni's gloves, off a loose drive
Pathan to Johnson, no run full and swinging, Johnson reads it and plonks bat down on it
Pathan to Johnson, 1 run sharp one, softening Johnson up as the ball jags into him but its well defended down towards gully
Pathan to Hussey, 1 run good ball, back of a length but equally well played, just gently defended to point and they set off
Pathan to Johnson, 2 runs good drive, getting to the pitch and piercing cover, then running hard for two
Tendulkar to Hussey, no run tossed up on a length, he gets forward and defends to point
Tendulkar to Hussey, no run tossed up again, he gets forward again but cannot beat cover
Tendulkar to Hussey, 1 run thats the 150, as Hussey advances and drives towards extra cover
Tendulkar to Johnson, no run quicker, flatter on off stump, Johnson gets up and drives to cover
Tendulkar to Johnson, no run tossed up again, Johnson waits and then drives to point
Tendulkar to Johnson, no run this one spins the other way as he covers off stump and leaves
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run back of a length on off stump, he gets back and plays to midwicket
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run shorter one, he gets up and across and pushes to cover for one
Sreesanth to Johnson, no run slower ball, 127ks, angles across Johnson, who leaves
Sreesanth to Johnson, OUT simple dismissal, Johnson driving on the up, front foot not to the pitch, and straight into the hands of Uthappa at cover
Sreesanth to Bracken, no run back of a length, swinging away, 134ks, Bracken pulls out of the shot
Sreesanth to Bracken, no run there's a fuller one, getting Bracken deep in the crease, defending
Sharma to Hussey, no run back of a length, middle and leg, played back to the bowler
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run bit too wide, allowing Hussey to drive a single towards extra cover
Sharma to Bracken, no run bounces him, gets him side-on, he weaves out of the way
Sharma to Bracken, no run slower ball off a length and Bracken, initially playing, holds back the bat
Sharma to Bracken, no run similar delivery, just a tad fuller, and again Bracken pulls back the bat

Sharma to Bracken, no run edged and dropped! Bracken gets bat on this one and the result is a thick outside edge that flies to Dhoni but, initially moving the other way, he fails to hold on ... wasn't the easiest take as it was dipping on him and he stuck out his right hand but it
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run drives a fullish delivery towards mid-off and sets off
Sreesanth to Bracken, no run back of a length outside off, he gets forward and defends
Sreesanth to Bracken, 1 run this time he connects well, driving a full delivery into the covers for one
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run back of a length, angling away, Hussey uses his feet and squirts this one towards Rohit at backward point
Sreesanth to Bracken, OUT all over for Bracken, trying to do downtown but only chipping a simple catch to Tendulkar at mid-on, and Australia are nine down
Sreesanth to Hussey, FOUR runs thats crucial runs, as Sreesanth drifts onto the pads and Hussey, ever so gently, gets bat on it to beat Dhoni down the leg side

Sharma to Clark, OUT thats that, as Clark drives from his crease and edges to Dhoni, giving Ishant his fourth wicket ... Clark stands his ground and looks at his feet but the umpire has no doubts about that one
And umm ... by the way ... Australia lost all the above mentioned games.
Nope, there's no escape for me. People want to know when India last beat Australia at the MCG. Well it was on January 31, 1986. Now can I get some lunch?

Plenty of queries as to when Australia were last bowled out inside 50 overs. Well, not long ago, actually - they were dismissed for 193 by India in Mumbai as recently as October 17, 2007. Before that, New Zealand got them for 148 in 49.3 overs on February 16. The last time they failed to

So, India have bowled out Australia for 159 in 43.1 overs. Ishant leads his team-mates off the field. A great effort from India, thanks to their seamers, who now need 160 to notch their first win of the CB Series. Only Hussey holding the innings together with an unbeaten 65. We will have
India's innings will be underway shortly. Virender Sehwag to face Brett Lee. Two slips in place.

18:27 local, 07:27 GMT Hi, welcome back. I've done my best to read all your feedback emails and answer what I could during the break, also taking time to get a bite to eat and squeeze in a game of office cricket to keep awake. Thanks for all the emails.
Lee to Sehwag, no run good length outside off stump, shaping away, and Sehwag leaves be
Lee to Sehwag, FOUR runs likes the length and flashes hard, very hard, at the outswinger and gets four off the outside edge that flies through the vacant third slip
Lee to Sehwag, no run thats good shape away from the right-hander, at 148ks, and Sehwag holds back the bat just in time
Lee to Sehwag, no run fuller length, scorching down leg stump and there's an inside-edge onto Sehwag's back leg as he drives from the crease
Lee to Sehwag, no run goes for a booming drive with no footwork, to a wide one, and misses
Lee to Sehwag, 1 wide full, very full down leg stump, 150ks, no bat involved and thats wide
Lee to Sehwag, no run dangerous leave, Sehwag not covering off stump as the ball goes on
Bracken to Tendulkar, 1 run thats a low full toss and not timed as he'd have liked, but he pushes down towards mid-off for a single
Bracken to Sehwag, 1 run pitches outside leg stump and he turns it out to Lee at deep fine leg

Bracken to Sehwag, FOUR runs edged and he doesn't get there! Ponting only has one slip in place, oddly, and Hayden cannot clutch onto the flashed outside-edge even as he dives to his right, he didn't get fingers on it so it wont count as a dropped catch
Bracken to Sehwag, no run back of a length outside off, Sehwag leaves it be
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run pace and bounce, drawing an edge from the shoulder of a surprised Tendulkar's bat and flies wide of third slip
Lee to Sehwag, no run back of a length, 149ks, jags in and he defends off the toes

Lee to Sehwag, no run thats well bowled, the yorker down leg stump at 149ks and Sehwag makes sure to lift his front leg before jamming bat down in time
Lee to Sehwag, no run now its a short one into the ribs, the ball lodges between Sehwag's underarm and hips before rolling down near his feet
Lee to Sehwag, no run short one outside off now, very pacy delivery and Sehwag sways back
Bracken to Tendulkar, 1 run full on off stump, 134ks, an inside-edged drive gets him one to square leg, raising Tendulkar's 1000th run in Australia
Bracken to Sehwag, no run good length on off stump, 133ks, firmly pushed to extra cover
Bracken to Sehwag, no run back of a length, seaming across him and he pulls out of the shot

Bracken to Sehwag, no run quicker ball, coming back in a bit and rapping him high on the knee roll as he pushes forward, Bracken asks the question but Taufel shakes his head ... it was a good ball, shaping back in but height was the factor
Bracken to Sehwag, no run bit fuller and he drives, with plenty of bottom hand, to mid-off

Bracken to Sehwag, OUT this time the umpire gives it! Bracken produces the same sort of delivery, getting just that little bit more purchase off the surface, and Sehwag takes it high on the front pad again and Taufel agrees with that one, though replays indicate it was going over m
Lee to Tendulkar, no run short of a length into the ribs, he hops and turns it towards square leg
Lee to Tendulkar, FOUR runs sees width and commits himself to an expansive drive outside off stump, just picking the gap at cover and the ball raises away, was in the air but safe
Lee to Tendulkar, FOUR runs shot of the day, without a doubt! Lee steams in and bowls a good length but Tendulkar greets it with the firmest of straight drives, smashes back for four
Lee to Tendulkar, no run back of a length, good lift, but he's right back and across in defence
Lee to Tendulkar, FOUR runs ah, class! Looking for the yorker, Lee overpitches and Tendulkar punches a straight drive the other side of the stumps for four, cuing hysteria at the MCG
Lee to Tendulkar, no run changes the length and almost sneaks through his backward defence
Bracken to Pathan, no run full outside off stump, comes back in and he leaves
Bracken to Pathan, no run good length on middle and leg, inside-edged back onto his pads
Bracken to Pathan, no run back of a length and angling in, he gets in line and defends
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run back of a length outside off, he gets back, opens the face and gets off the mark
Bracken to Tendulkar, no run good length on middle and leg, he gets back and turns it away
Bracken to Tendulkar, 2 runs comes forward to a full one and steers it through the gap at cover and point
Lee to Pathan, no run back of a length outside off, sits up and he gets tall to drop at his feet
Lee to Pathan, 1 run short into the ribs, Pathan tucks it to the onside and responds to Tendulkar's call for an urgent single, running well to the other end

Lee to Pathan, no run short on leg stump, he does well to turn it towards square leg

Lee to Pathan, no run short of a length outside off, 137ks, he gets up and defends to point

Bracken to Tendulkar, no run overpitched outside off stump, thats a mistimed drive to extra cover
Bracken to Tendulkar, 1 run touch shot, riding the bounce and angling the bat to produce one past gully

Bracken to Pathan, FOUR runs short and wide, Pathan slashes up and over the slips, it bounces once in front of third man and then in a flash Lee comes screaming across like the Roadrunner, getting a hand on it but thats four.. but what an effort!
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run thats a better shot, Pathan cutting late through a diving point for one
Bracken to Tendulkar, no run short of a length, crunched into the covers where Ponting pulls of a stop

Lee to Pathan, no run back of a length on off stump, the bat comes down late and he plays to point

Lee to Pathan, no run slower ball, full outside off stump and he pushes to Haddin point
Lee to Pathan, no run short of a length on middle stump, he gets across and tucks to leg

Bracken to Pathan, no run good length this time, 134.7ks, he stops on the shot to cover

Clark to Pathan, no run straighter one, 128.6ks, Pathan gets behind it and defends
Clark to Pathan, no run good delivery, not giving him any width and he again plays back to Clark

Clark to Tendulkar, no run oh ho ho! Tendulkar charges down the track, swings across the line, there's a bit of noise on that, Gilchrist takes it and they all ask the question but its that man Rudi Koerzten who's unmoved ... sounded like plenty of bat to me ... I'll confirm when I
Johnson to Pathan, 2 runs pitches too straight and Pathan clips it through midwicket for two
Johnson to Gambhir, no run pace and bounce outside off stump, 144ks and Gambhir leaves
Johnson to Gambhir, no run much fuller, 145ks and curling back into off stump as he leaves

Clark to Tendulkar, no run bit of seam movement, the ball moving in off a length and Tendulkar adjusts to open the face and run it down towards gully

Clark to Tendulkar, 2 runs sees some width and intentionally opens the face, playing it late and wristily working it through where first slip would have been, some good diving and sliding at third man from Johnson restricts him to two

Clark to Tendulkar, no run good length outside off, he comes forward and drives to point
Johnson to Gambhir, no run sharp delivery gets Gambhir in a tangle, as he tries to leave again but the ball rises and hits bat, almost dropping on to off stump

Johnson to Gambhir, no run back of a good length into middle and leg, defended to midwicket
Johnson to Gambhir, no run short one now and Gambhir, a little man, rides the bounce to keep it down

Johnson to Gambhir, no run much fuller and Gambhir knows where his off stump is, shouldering arms

Clark to Gambhir, no run 135ks, Clark's quickest today, and Gambhir leaves it be outside off

Symonds to Rohit Sharma, no run slower ball, 74ks on off stump, defended back to mid-on
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, no run reaches out and drives a flat one into the covers
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs uses his feet nicely, clipping wide of midwicket with little hassle
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run short outside leg stump, he works it off the hips to square leg
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a bit wide and he goes for the cut, nearly chopping onto his stumps, in the end its an easy single as the ball runs wide of Gilchrist
Johnson to Dhoni, no run back of a length outside off stump, he gets up and shoulders arms
Johnson to Dhoni, no run pitches full outside leg stump, Dhoni misses out on the flick but Johnson runs in to cut off the single, as there was nobody at square leg
Johnson to Dhoni, no run pushed across him off a fuller length, he covers off stump and leaves
Johnson to Dhoni, no run back of a length, he gets across and pokes it to point
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up outside off stump, he waits for the spin and plays to point
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, no run flatter on off stump, uses his feet and drives it back to Symonds
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, no run flat again, off stump, and he plays it back to Symonds again
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, 3 runs thats the 150 as Rohit gives himself room, dancing down and going inside-out over extra cover but the ball stops up in the deep
Symonds to Dhoni, 1 leg bye slides down the pads and he eases that into the corner for one
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs good shot, as he stands and again drives on the up, this time along the ground and wide of extra cover and mid-off to end a good over
Clarke to Dhoni, no run flat on middle and off, played back to the bowler
Clarke to Dhoni, no run tossed up on middle and off this time, but he plays it back again
Clarke to Dhoni, no run tossed up a touch wider, inviting the drive, but he leaves it be
Clarke to Dhoni, no run flatter and shorter, he impatiently gets back and thumps it to cover
Clarke to Dhoni, no run flat again outside off stump and he plays towards point
Clarke to Dhoni, 1 run flat on the stumps, this time he uses his feet and nudges into the gap
Symonds to Dhoni, no run tossed up on off stump, Dhoni works it across the line and Symonds fields
Symonds to Dhoni, no run much flatter now, he still walks across the stumps and drives it back
Symonds to Dhoni, 1 run flat and quick on middle and off, he shuffles and drives to mid-on
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, no run no room to work with so Rohit drives it back to Symonds' left
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs and the scores are level as he pulls a short one to deep midwicket
Symonds to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide thats a wide one, very short down leg stump, and the MCG erupts as India win game four of the CB Series by five wickets!

Thats all we have for you, folks, and I thank you for tuning in. Do join us for game five, between India and Sri Lanka at Canberra on February 12, (10:00 local, 23:00 GMT). On behalf of all of us at Cricinfo, this is Jamie Alter signing off. Cheers!
Ishant deservedly receives the Man-of-the-Match award for setting up this win.

In reply, India lost wickets at regular intervals but ultimately eased home with five wickets and 25 deliveries remaining. Its their first win against Australia at the MCG since January 31, 1986. A satisfying win for them, and they now lead the CB Series points table. They did not get th

It pretty much all went India's way after Australia opted to bat first on a hard MCG surface. Their seam bowlers turned in a top display, led by young Ishant Sharma, who came back marvelously from an 18-run over to dent Australia with 4 for 38, his career-best effort in ODIs. He continue
India have beaten the world champions in their back yard.
India won by 5 wickets (with 25 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Ishant Sharma, INDIA
